page.title: 15SPORTS IN SHIPSTON
page.content: We interviewed men and women in Shipston-on-Stour about the sports facilities in the area and their use. The following is a list of the sports available in order of popularity of use: Swimming,Tennis,Darts,Badminton, Jogging,Snooker,Football,Fishing, Cricket,Canoeing,Bowls and Rugby.65% of those interviewed took part in Swimming. The average number of sports per person was three.Two men both took part in eight sports. People travel to other places to take part in the following sports: Golf, Shooting,Hunting,Sailing,Surfing, Squash and Aunt Sally.The most popular of these are Shooting and Squash.More men than women travelled to other places but some women took part in Shooting and Hunting.
